notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: S.R., A.P., F.S., I.M.S. and J.K. designed the study, interpreted the data and wrote the main manuscript text. S.R. and A.P. created the software. S.R. F.S. and I.M.S. derived the equations and analyzed the solutions. I.M.S. and S.R. wrote the supplementary text.
